body_html: Note for communication clarity: it's only a "build failure" if it means that the build (not test) of the PR fails. Even if the test failure is due to some build problem, don't call it build failure; people will get confused ;)
body_text: Note for communication clarity:  it's only a "build failure" if it means that the build (not test) of the PR fails. Even if the test failure is due to some build problem, don't call it build failure; people will get confused ;)
body: Note for communication clarity:  it's only a "build failure" if it means that the build (not test) of the PR fails. Even if the test failure is due to some build problem, don't call it build failure; people will get confused ;)
